data.title: SonicWall Advanced Gateway Security Suite
meta_keywords: SonicWall Advanced Gateway Security Suite - subscription license (1 year) - 1 license
data.meta_description: Buy a SonicWall Advanced Gateway Security Suite - subscription license (1 year) - 1 license or other Firewalls at CDW.com
data.text:
Protect devices from viruses, spyware and intrusion with the SonicWallÂ® Advanced Gateway Security Suite Subscription License. This protection lasts for one year and includes 24/7 support. The SonicWall Advanced Gateway Security Suite provides antivirus, anti-spyware, intrusion prevention, application intelligence and a control service subscription. It also includes a content filtering subscription and a Capture Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) Service subscription, which allows access to preventative measures and adapting threat protection and file analysis.

Receive a year of protection against trojans, viruses, worms and other internet and network threats. Block spyware and disrupt existing spyware communications. Enforce policies and receive up-to-date application classification. All threat protection is continuous and in real-time. Prevent access to and from inappropriate websites. Gain reliable protection thanks to updated cross-references and a firewall database. Get regular software and firmware updates for consistent protection. Call, email, chat or receive web assistance any time for help with basic configurations and troubleshooting. This security suite works with the SonicWall NSA 2650.
